issue.title: [Python] Drop support for python 2.7
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7555](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7555). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After the 0.16 release we should consider to drop support for python 2.7 because it is not maintained anymore.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7555?focusedCommentId=17014737) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
We probably need to discuss this on the mailing list. Sadly Python 2.7 is still the most popular Python version according to pypistats.org

https://pypistats.org/packages/pyarrow

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7555?focusedCommentId=17014961) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
With conda, on the other hand, Python 2.7 is only 5% of the downloads (but, conda downloads are much smaller in number than the PyPI ones. I checked Dec 2019, which had 137,845 downloads on conda, which is kind the daily number on PyPI).

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7555?focusedCommentId=17014963) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
But closing this as a duplicate of ARROW-5757 (and we actually also already had ARROW-331 as well which discussed this, and where it was decided to support until end of 2019).

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7555?focusedCommentId=17014967) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~wesm]` The main purpose of this ticket was to collect the python 2.7 related issues. We definitely need to decide on the ML.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7555?focusedCommentId=17015224) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I think pyarrow is being picked up by a lot of automated container builds on GCE. We should ask Apache Beam (which is a proxy in part for Google Cloud DataFlow) what their plan in regarding Python 2.7
